name: error-pdu
description: Represents a BACnet Error Protocol Data Unit (PDU) returned in response to a confirmed service request that resulted in an error.

fields.name: pdu-type
fields.description: The PDU type identifier (5 for BACnet-Error-PDU).

fields.name: original-invoke-id
fields.description: The invoke ID from the original confirmed service request that caused this error.

fields.name: error-choice
fields.description: The confirmed service type that resulted in the error.

fields.name: error
fields.description: The error information containing error class and error code.
